verbose_text: The best characterized TF groups are ABA responsive element binding protein1 (AREB1), ABA responsive binding factor 2 (ABF2), dehydration responsive binding protein (DREB) genes, MYB genes, bZIP encoding genes and the protein kinases such as receptor like kinase 1, SNF1 related protein kinase 2C or guard cell expressing calcium dependent protein kinases.
evidence: SNF1-related protein kinase 2C or guard cell expressing
